channel.title: Comments on: Guruza – yet another UQAN implementation
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: richcollins
item.dc:creator: richcollins
item.description:
Hi Amit.
I am one of the founders of Guruza. We would certainly be interested in getting your input given your previous interest in Q&A sites. We just put out a question asking for feedback: http://guruza.com/question/233/reward-25.00
Please let us know what you think about the site.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Amit.

I am one of the founders of Guruza. We would certainly be interested in getting your input given your previous interest in Q&A sites. We just put out a question asking for feedback:
http://guruza.com/question/233/reward-25.00

Please let us know what you think about the site.
